snippet: British employers are offering higher pay as the pool of good job candidates dries up at its fastest rate in nearly a decade, according to a survey which may worry the Bank of England....

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Increasingly Struggle to Fill Vacancies-Survey
headline.main: UK Employers Increasingly Struggle to Fill Vacancies-Survey

lead_paragraph: British employers are offering higher pay as the pool of good job candidates dries up at its fastest rate in nearly a decade, according to a survey which may worry the Bank of England.
